item.title: 11-21-08 SHOW
item.description: Another new episode of the "Best Damn Morning Show Period" that can only be heard on Power 88.1 FM every Friday from 10am-12pm. On the show this morning, the band "Testing For Echo" stopped by the show to talk about their music and play 3 acoustic songs right in the studio!
item.dc:creator: DJ AMK
item.itunes:summary: Another new episode of the "Best Damn Morning Show Period" that can only be heard on Power 88.1 FM every Friday from 10am-12pm. On the show this morning, the band "Testing For Echo" stopped by the show to talk about their music and play 3 acoustic songs right in the studio!

item.title: 11-14-08 Show
item.description: Another new edition of the "Best Damn Morning Show Period" that can only be heard on Power 88.1 every Friday from 10am-12. On the show this morning, as a result of the actions that took place on last night's show on BlogTalkRadio, DJ AMK officially declared radio war on all of the people that hate his guts. Also, the bands "Kelsey & The Chaos" and "The Crash Moderns" stopped by the show to talk about their music and play acoustic right in the studio!
item.dc:creator: DJ AMK
item.itunes:summary: Another new edition of the "Best Damn Morning Show Period" that can only be heard on Power 88.1 every Friday from 10am-12. On the show this morning, as a result of the actions that took place on last night's show on BlogTalkRadio, DJ AMK officially declared radio war on all of the people that hate his guts. Also, the bands "Kelsey & The Chaos" and "The Crash Moderns" stopped by the show to talk about their music and play acoustic right in the studio!

item.title: "AMK In The Morning" Halloween Special
item.description: It's the first-ever "AMK In The Morning" Halloween Special! On the show, we played classic Halloween songs and had the first-ever "AMK In The Morning" Halloween Costume Contest. If you missed the show live on the radio, you have to check out this podcast!
item.dc:creator: DJ AMK
item.itunes:summary: It's the first-ever "AMK In The Morning" Halloween Special! On the show, we played classic Halloween songs and had the first-ever "AMK In The Morning" Halloween Costume Contest. If you missed the show live on the radio, you have to check out this podcast!

item.title: 10/24/08 SHOW
item.description: DJ AMK and the rest of the Morning Crew chilled out at the WARY studio and DJ Camus sabotaged the show for at least 5 minutes. A lot of random talk about kinkiness and bashing on DJ Camus, plus a cameo from station manager Rad himself!
item.dc:creator: DJ AMK
